name: ugolki
description: The public and open-source way to play Ugolki online. [Play it live on Ugolki.net!](https://www.ugolki.net/)

scripts.start: concurrently "nodemon server/index.js localhost 3001" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.postinstall: (cd client && npm install && npm link ugolki-lib) && (cd lib && npm install) && (cd db && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm link ugolki-lib && npm run build
